DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) . Pulmonary function characterize forced expiratory volume 1 second/forced vital capacity ratio < 0.7 , force expiratory volume one second < 80 % predict . Subjects recent COPD exacerbation require emergency department visit hospitalization within last month .
